specification.title: Enhanced Conversions for Leads - Offline Conversion Import Requirements

implementation_components: Conversion action setup in Google Ads
Google Sheets integration for offline data import
Proper timestamp formatting in data imports
technical_access_needed: Google Sheets with proper data formatting

support_case_management.client_id_reference: Must be included in all communications
support_case_management.attendee_inclusion: All stakeholders must be invited to technical calls
